Detailed Description

basic BasicCondition class, representing a type-1 BasicCondition

Member Data Documentation

std::pair<bool,int> ConditionSkeleton::dist_

distance of tokens, dist_first == true -> distance between tokens cant be more than dist_.second, dist_.first == false -> there is no criteria on tokens distance

std::vector<LemmaVal> ConditionSkeleton::lemmaValues_

if one or both tokens must have specific lemmas, they are stored here, empty if no specifric lemma is required

std::pair<bool,int> ConditionSkeleton::order_

word order check, if order_.first = true -> BasicCondition in order_.second must be met (ie. there is a word order requirement for this BasicCondition) order_.second = which of the two tokens must be first

std::vector<LemmaVal> ConditionSkeleton::tokenValues_

if one or both tokens muset have specific values (ie the words as they are), they are stored here empty if no specific values are required
